descriptions: Identifies one or two actions vaguely related to reproductive and sexual health.
Identifies one or two specific actions to protect reproductive and sexual health, but lacks detail.
Identifies three to four specific actions, with some explanation of how they protect health.
Identifies five or more specific actions, explaining how they protect health.
Identifies five or more specific actions, thoroughly explaining how they protect reproductive and sexual health, demonstrating a comprehensive understanding.
Information provided is inaccurate or irrelevant.
Information provided has significant inaccuracies or is not relevant to reproductive and sexual health.
Information is mostly accurate but may contain minor inaccuracies or some irrelevant details.
Information is accurate and relevant, with only minor omissions.
Information is accurate, relevant, and comprehensive.
Information is exceptionally accurate, relevant, and demonstrates a deep understanding of reproductive and sexual health protection.
Description is unclear and difficult to understand.
Description lacks clarity and contains significant grammatical errors.
Description is somewhat clear but could be improved with better organization and grammar.
Description is clear and well-organized, with few grammatical errors.
Description is clear, concise, and well-organized, with excellent grammar.
Description is exceptionally clear, articulate, and persuasive, demonstrating excellent communication skills.
